title: Apropos

properties.name: description
properties.value: Apropos was a female dragon rider, who served Zaros near the end of the Second Age. However, when Zamorak betrayed Zaros, Apropos sided with Zamorak and the other rebels. Her fate following her betrayal is unknown.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Apropos

Apropos was a female dragon rider, who served Zaros near the end of the Second Age. However, when Zamorak betrayed Zaros, Apropos sided with Zamorak and the other rebels. Her fate following her betrayal is unknown.
rawContent:
{{external|rs}}
'''Apropos''' was a female [[dragon rider]], who served [[Zaros]] near the end of the [[Second Age]]. However, when [[Zamorak]] betrayed Zaros, Apropos sided with Zamorak and the other rebels. Her fate following her betrayal is unknown.

[[Category:Zamorakians]]
[[Category:Characters that do not appear in-game]]
[[Category:Characters from the Second Age]]
